# [Interview #1076: WoR Signing Report - Bartbug, Entry #18](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1076#18)

#### Question

Is Bavadin the only shard on Taldain?

#### Brandon Sanderson

He is the only shard on the planet.

#### Question

Is he the sun?

#### Brandon Sanderson

RAFO
